title: Hi, I Don't Know What I'm Doing, But I May Have Original Ideas (Or Not)
body:
Dear Readers (Riot Employees and Common Folks alike),

I would like to be able to change my Summoner's Icon in the Champion Select screen. Who else wants this to happen? 

The reason I want this to become reality is simple: I like sets. I like to go into games, with the same skin, and the same (or similarly themed) wards, and Summoner Icon.

Really, it's all about looking professional WHILE SMASHING YOUR ENEMIES TO THE GROUND. 

One more thing, and I'm sure people are tired of seeing it: PLEASE LET US ORGANIZE THE NEW RUNE PAGES. I WANT TO MOVE THEM AROUND, INSTEAD OF deleting all of them and then making new ones, just to get them in order.

Okay, for sure the Rune Pages thingy will be fixed in upcoming patches. But I'm not sure about the Summoner's Icon. Please, I would like to change them because I don't really know who I want to play each time. I do like burst champions, and most of them have sets in Icons, Skins, and Wards.

Okay, I don't really know how to end this, so here goes:

Thank you, and have a great day.

Lief Shade (It feels weird not putting my real name here, oh well. I don't want to end up dead in my bed yet, sooooo... BYE~)
{{champion:131}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:56}}

replies.body:
Y'know, I'm honestly not sure that I've ever heard something like this suggested! Points for originality!

Honestly, I'm not sure if something like this would ever make its way into the game, but your best bet of getting these ideas noticed would be to post them over in Client Discussion for the Devs to see ^_^

Oh okay, thanks :D


Quick question. Where's Client Discussion?
